headline: ConocoPhillips Awards FEED Study Contract to Subsea7 Offshore Norway
summary: COP mentions that the FEED study will enable it to determine and finalize the technical specifications for the Previously Produced Fields project.

raw.headline: ConocoPhillips Awards FEED Study Contract to Subsea7 Offshore Norway
raw.summary: COP mentions that the FEED study will enable it to determine and finalize the technical specifications for the Previously Produced Fields project.

headline: Ecopetrol Expands Renewables Portfolio Through Latest Acquisition
summary: EC mentions that the portfolio of wind and solar energy projects acquired from Statkraft could have a total capacity of up to 1.3 GW.

raw.headline: Ecopetrol Expands Renewables Portfolio Through Latest Acquisition
raw.summary: EC mentions that the portfolio of wind and solar energy projects acquired from Statkraft could have a total capacity of up to 1.3 GW.

headline: Petrobras Prepares Drill Ship Deployment for Oil Exploration in Amapa
summary: PBR is set to deploy a drill ship to Amapa for oil exploration in the Foz do Amazonas Basin amid regulatory hurdles and environmental scrutiny.

raw.headline: Petrobras Prepares Drill Ship Deployment for Oil Exploration in Amapa
raw.summary: PBR is set to deploy a drill ship to Amapa for oil exploration in the Foz do Amazonas Basin amid regulatory hurdles and environmental scrutiny.
